ModMetaData.name: ED-EnhancedOptions
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.18.0.3 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=37158
Please Check the Mod Settings by going into the Options, Selecting "Mod Options" and then "ED-EnhancedOptions".
This mod adds various additional options to change the way Rimworld works. These options are as follows: - Stop Letters from being shown. - Allow Plants to Grow 24H a day, also has an option for SunLamps." - Prevents Traps from triggering on your Colonists. - Allows force attack commands to be given to turrets. - Hides the Small Power Connection Wires, Still show in Power overlay Mode. - Suppress random Breakdowns. - Lock the ability to change DevMode. - Allow Speed4 Without Dev Mode needing to be enabled, can be turned on by pressing '4'. - Visual Customization of Blight. - Stop Forced Time Slowdown (Combat). - Stop Stripping Corps before Cremation. - Hide Marriage CaravanPacking and Party Spots.
